sentences.sentence: Many of the other ingredients for success that they identify-orthography, geography and history-have nothing to do with how schools are run, or what happens in classrooms.
sentences.translation: 他们指出，其他的许多成功因素例如正字、地理和历史教育跟学校运营没有什么关系，也跟教室里面所发生的事情无关。

sentences.sentence: So, what do you do when an orthography has hundreds of characters and additional special, contextual combinations?
sentences.translation: 那么，如果一种拼字法中有数百个字符，或者更特殊一点，它们之间有很多组合，情况如何呢？

sentences.sentence: This orthography might have confounded the pretensions put forward in the last century by the Vicomte DE Gestas, of a descent from the wicked thief.
sentences.translation: 前一世纪的哲斯塔斯子爵自诩是那坏强盗的后代，他如果见了这种写法，也许不大高兴吧。
